title: MVP
description: YsabelleI love you.Three words that can make or break you.I thought I needed to find myself. I thought I wasn’t happy. I thought I needed more out of life.I didn’t.I’m more lost now than I was when I left. I have no answers, just endless amounts of questions. It was only a matter of time until the truth came to light. I never imagined it would change my entire life and everything I thought to be true.It was all a game.Except I wasn’t a player.I was a pawn.SebastianThe end.Two words that have several meanings. I never thought I’d lose her. But did I ever really have her…Or did VIP?Can love conquer all?WARNING: Sex/language. Mature readers only.
author: M.  Robinson
